name: Model Z
description:
Model Z is a rougelite topdown shooter where you need to adapt to your weapon.

Fight! Devour! Take their weapon and become stronger and stronger.

Climb to the top of the tower and take back what was once yours.

------------------------------------------------

The game currently only has several enemies and 1 boss. Around 12 weapons and a tons of upgrade. Gameplay is around 15 min - 2 hour depending on how you fair with the current boss.

There's no way to save the game as of the current version. You have to go through the tutorial everytime you start a new game (As a roguelite, there's no game over so you don't have to worry much about this.)

# Note 1: Pressing quit game in the browser kills the game. You need to press F5 to reload the game again.

# Note 2: There's a weird antialiasing bug causing the game to look glitchy on the web, highly recomend downloading the game.
